name: Tacos
description: A tortilla filled with various ingredients, such as meat (usually beef, pork, or chicken), onions, fresh cilantro, guacamole, and spicy sauce.

name: Quesadillas
description: A tortilla filled with cheese (and sometimes meat, beans, or other ingredients), fried or baked.

name: Pozole
description: A traditional Mexican soup made with hominy, meat (usually chicken or pork), and spices.
